title: Comparative analysis of insecticidal value against Sitophilus oryzae (L.) and agro-morphological characteristics of maize using non-biogenic and biogenic ZnO nanoparticles.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00839H, Paper
Aisvarya S, M. Kalyanasundaram, Kannan Malaisamy, Arunkumar P, Preetha Sundharam, Elango K, Govindaraju Kasivelu
Utilizing environmentally friendly nanomaterials to address insect pests and promote plant growth is urgently needed. The present study was conducted to find an alternative to chemical insecticide by comparing the...
